website_summaries.verdict: Thin and dimpled material on the shoe's exterior delivers a nice touch on the ball.
pros: We love how these cleats fit like a glove with high-quality materials that enhance ball striking and natural control
Reinforced in the toe and mid-foot to provide better longevity
Extremely comfortable shoes for wearing during long practices or multiple games
cons: May want to add a foot insert, as sole is thin enough to feel studs

customer_reviews.title: I love the cleats
customer_reviews.text: I love the cleats. It took some time to get used to putting them on as there is no tongue. But the comfort level is insane, I have been buying soccer cleats for 18 years now and this is my favorite pair I have owned in terms of both comfort and traction. I recently wore them at an Ultimate Frisbee Tournament, playing for 8 hours straight for two days. No blisters, and even on the mildly wet conditions I did not slip at all. I cannot speak for durability as I have only had them for a few weeks. The shoes seem like they will last.
customer_reviews.author: Eric LaPietra

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: They fit me perfectly and it has great quality materials and it looks great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit great. Unbelievably light weight
customer_reviews.text: Fit great. Unbelievably light weight. It is different putting these shoes on. Kinda hard or just different. But "0" slippage. They fit as if the are a part of your feet. And no slippage on the pitch either. I hope they last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Recommend this product to everyone who plays football! Yes it's the real deal not fake cleats!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Built for those NikeSkin lovers of the original Phantom. ...
customer_reviews.text: Built for those NikeSkin lovers of the original Phantom. Avoid the version 1 upper the original Phinish launched in. It was too stiff and Nike realized this so they corrected the issue with NikeSkin.
customer_reviews.author: ramelendez

customer_reviews.title: Buy with care!
customer_reviews.text: I was sent a pair of $30 hypervenom phade's that weren't even the same size! My refund will temper my anger I suppose, but still, what a huge disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looked slightly used
customer_reviews.text: Product was good and real but looked as if it was used had a little dirt in some places other than that the cleats where fine and new
customer_reviews.author: Angie BM

customer_reviews.title: Bae asf
customer_reviews.text: Love this cleats. Amazing colorway. Fast shipping. Beautiful cleats. I recommened you to buy these cleats 😍😍😍😍😍
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Great product and it was exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Great product and it was exactly what I needed. It came with the bag also. Very happy that I found originals for a better price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was perfect and a nice Nike drawstring bag surprise!! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tuff asf
customer_reviews.text: Loved em :) late review but they lasted 8 months which is really good but now the sole and upper are separated :////
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Were they the purple ones or the green? Cause it says 2 colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kurron Lynch

product_meta.title: Nike Hypervenom Phinish FG Soccer Cleats
product_meta.description: Engineered for the attacking goalscorer, the Nike Hypervenom Phinish II Men's Firm-Ground Soccer Cleat offers maximum agility and barefoot-like touch on the ball.
feature_bullets: Firm-ground (FG) cleats for use on short-grass fields that may be slightly wet but rarely muddy
Molded, perforated sockliner with built-in heel cup for a secure fit and reduced cleat pressure
Nylon chassis with a Pebax base for support and a responsive feel
